name: Grilled Tilapia in Foil Packets
author: momof2
summary: Tilapia grilled in foil packets with tomatoes and green chile peppers.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1  jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced, or to taste
1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
directions: Season tilapia with salt and pepper
Place olive oil and garlic in a bowl or resealable bag and add seasoned tilapia
Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 15 minutes
Place each tilapia fillet onto its own aluminum foil square
Use the fish to smear the tin foil with olive oil
Spoon diced tomatoes, onion, and jalapeno evenly over fillets
Top with bell pepper and cilantro
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate
Cook fillets on the preheated grill until easily flaked with a fork, about 10 minutes, flipping halfway through cooking time
